author: Erasmus, Desiderius, d. 1536.
publisher: By Robert copland, [sic] for Iohan Byddell, otherwyse Salysbury. the .v. daye of Ianuary, and be for to sell lat ye sygne of our lady of pyte nexte to flete brydge,
notes: Title from D2 recto. Imprint from colophon. Publication date from STC.
A selection from Erasmus. Desiderius.  Colloquia.
Includes, with caption title: "A good and a godly admonicion or warnynge, very behouefull for euery chrysten man to loke upon". Register is continuous.
Imperfect; lacking leaf A1 (title page) and tightly bound affecting text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
